effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon fainted on the previous turn, this move has double power.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon fainted on the previous turn, this move has double power.

short_effect.x_y: Has double power if a friendly Pokémon fainted last turn.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Has double power if a friendly Pokémon fainted last turn.

flavor_text.x_y: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this move becomes more powerful.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this move becomes more powerful.
